publications.title: Generation of an induced pluripotent stem cell line from a patient with retinitis pigmentosa caused by RP1 mutation

donor.disease_description: Retinitis pigmentosa caused by a dominant nonsense mutation in the RP1 gene (c.2098G > T p.E700X)

genomic_modifications.description: Dominant nonsense mutation in the RP1 gene (c.2098G > T p.E700X)

genomic_characterisation.summary: Normal diploid karyotype (46, XX) with no chromosomal rearrangements detected by genome-wide copy number variation profiling.
genomic_characterisation.karyotype_method: Illumina Beadchip SNP Array with CNV Analysis

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: Episomal plasmids containing OCT4, SOX2, KLF4, L-MYC, LIN28, shRNA for p53 and miR-302/367

ethics.institutional_HREC: University of Western Australia Human Research Ethics Committee
